suppress.notes: False Positives CVE-2022-1471 - SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can be instantiated during deserialization, spring uses SafeConstructor which is the recommended workaround CVE-2023-35116 - Not believed to be a valid vulnerability - see https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972 CVE-2023-36414 - This CVE only refers to the .NET Azure Identity SDK up to version 1.10.2. DependencyCheck appears to be matching incorrectly against azure-identity-extensions and ignoring the language version - see https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/6334 CVE-2023-36415 - This CVE only refers to the Azure Identity SDK and only up to version 1.10.2 of the Java version of it. DependencyCheck appears to be matching incorrectly against azure-identity-extensions and incorrectly flagging azure-identity as being affected, even though a non-vulnerable version is being used - see https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/5992
